General.Name: Beijing Shengtong Printing Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Shengtong Printing Co., Ltd. provides printing services for publication industries in China. The company primarily prints magazines, newspapers, hardcover books, periodicals, books, and commercial publicity materials products. It also provides binding, other printed matter printing, trademark printing, general cargo transportation, import and export of goods and technology, and advertising production, as well as sales of papers and inks. In addition, the company offers packaging services for pharmaceutical and food products; technology education services for schools, training institutions, youth palaces and other partners; and multiple services, such as research, development and sales of training aids, technical system support, project research, and curriculum entry into schools. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.
